title: Karthus is permabanned in one for all and Heimer isnt?!?!?!?!?
body: Explain to me how Heimer and his team can have 50 turrets down,all group mid, get first turret by 2 minutes and win the game solely by pushing and making your entire team rage quit? While an immobile skill shot dependent mana hungry mage isnt evenn in the game atm

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Too much rage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VhZXIAET,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-10-22T09:24:34.552+0000)
>
> Explain to me how Heimer and his team can have 50 turrets down,all group mid, get first turret by 2 minutes and win the game solely by pushing and making your entire team rage quit? **While an immobile skill shot dependent mana hungry mage isnt evenn in the game atm**

*cough* Xerath *cough*
Heimerdinger can easily be countered if you play someone such as Blitz, Leona, Thresh etc where you can get them away from their turrets easily or have a hard engage. It's not hard to build MR so that their turrets deal less damage. I've played against him and won every single time.
Try to blitz or thresh grab one of them through a line of 15 turrets, thresh and blitz work well in theory but not in practice.
everyone that complains about heimerdinger are riven mains who are too young to understand not to fight him in laning phase (cos they're 12)
When you play heimer in one for all there is no laning phase, they all go mid. Honestly did you not even read the title??
but thats stupid, it would only work at level 6 otherwise they'll be greatly inexperienced to regular lanes but also couldnt defend themselves

You realise you can hook from different angles it's not one straightforward ability where the only way you can hook them is if they're directly infront of you. You can easily hide in one of the bushes next to mid (for example) and hook them to you as Blitz.
again it works well in theory...

Because it's not 50 is _only_ 15.

Sarcasm aside. He is actually pretty easy to counter IF and that's a big if, your team is also playing an AP champ. Morgana is even better cause of the spell shield. The reason is this nifty little item that everyone forgets about called Banner of Command which makes the empowered minion immune to magic damage in addition to some extra resistances (plus some tasty AP/MR/CDR/Health/Health Regen, it's actually a really underrated item even in norms against AP heavy teams). So you dump it on a cannon in each lane then drop the other two somewhere in those waves (probs where you aren't) and the poor little Heimers (who are never gonna go AD) have to sit there basic attacking an almost super minion to death.

Of course that only works if you're an AP team, so if you know you're gonna be AP you can leave him open, otherwise guess it's gonna cost you a ban.

But I agree they should at the very least give 5 bans for featured gamemodes.
I think the main reason karthus is permabanned is becasue every 200/180/160 seconds someone gets a pentakill.

Zhonya and Banshee prevents that from happening
Spacing them out enough causes it to still happen.

the ults would do so much damage that if they all ulted the last 2 would be wasted and only 3 will be dealing damage (if they all were smart with their builds and had roughly 1000 AP) my record for AP on Karthus would have to be 1300 (with both Mejai's and Rabadon)

Heimerdinger is a great lane holder but he can't push and once he reaches like lvl 18 he is not as strong as other champions. (I had a game Kayle vs Heimerdinger) and we lost so bad early game but late game we smashed em because of our damage was much higher.
